name: places/ChIJlYpIkBBawokRjyd8kYQpUrc
formattedAddress: 85 West Street At, Albany St, New York, NY 10006, USA
adrFormatAddress: 85 West Street At, Albany St, New York, NY 10006, USA

editorialSummary.text: Modern Downtown lodging offering warm rooms & suites, plus a burger joint, a bar & a fitness room.

originalText.text:
My room had a great view!
Room was pretty clean.
I got a late checkout because of my Gold Marriott status, but they came in around 10 am (not even regular checkout time, and with do not disturb sign).
The other down side, they gave us a card with daily 25$ credit and we used it every day at the restaurant but they deducted those from around account and I had to call them and go downstairs to ask them to fix it, and they said they will fix it but I’m still waiting for the money being deposited to my account.

text.text:
My room had a great view!
Room was pretty clean.
I got a late checkout because of my Gold Marriott status, but they came in around 10 am (not even regular checkout time, and with do not disturb sign).
The other down side, they gave us a card with daily 25$ credit and we used it every day at the restaurant but they deducted those from around account and I had to call them and go downstairs to ask them to fix it, and they said they will fix it but I’m still waiting for the money being deposited to my account.

originalText.text: Pretty terrible front desk service. Upon arrival, agent never looked up, simply said "ID and Credit Card please" and pointed to the elevator while never looking away from her computer. I have requested my receipt multiple times from the hotel but they will not send it and it is not loading in the Marriott app. The room was nice and very clean, however, walls are very thin. I did not hear street noise on 19th floor. Make sure to use the dining credit in the destination fee or its money down the drain. Location is great, but there are other hotels in Downtown that are just as nice with just as good of a location. I only stayed one night and moved to the Conrad for three nights. Highly recommend the Conrad!

Highly recommend the Conrad!

originalText.text: Bell staff and front desk delivered a World Class Customer experience. Had a great weekend experiencing the in house restaurants. Clean and quiet rooms .

text.text: Bell staff and front desk delivered a World Class Customer experience. Had a great weekend experiencing the in house restaurants. Clean and quiet rooms .

originalText.text:
Great location. The property is well-managed with rooms, facilities, and amenities in good condition. Much better than the other Marriott flagged hotels in FiDi in terms of upkeep and quality.

However, there was a snag: the hotel's dry cleaning service ripped one of my dress shirts. Despite having to recount the incident 5 times with different stakeholders,  I never received any resolution.

text.text:
Great location. The property is well-managed with rooms, facilities, and amenities in good condition. Much better than the other Marriott flagged hotels in FiDi in terms of upkeep and quality.

However, there was a snag: the hotel's dry cleaning service ripped one of my dress shirts. Despite having to recount the incident 5 times with different stakeholders,  I never received any resolution.

originalText.text: This was the highest stage I have ever stayed at, and it meant the view was absolutely stunning. I even saw the Statue of Liberty. I was particularly pleased with the location, especially because it's situated in the financial district, one of the safest areas of NY. However, the breakfast was the worst I've encountered in all my hotel experiences. It consisted of just four items: tea or coffee, pork, chicken, and potatoes. Overall, I enjoyed my stay, but I often left hungry.
